comments.body: That's as designed. If you want them, download the zip.
*** Bug 36329 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

It would be nice if the installer proposes to users if they want to install
those extra files.  It's a lot easier to use the installer than the zip.  One
example is setting up the service and the nice little service monitor.

(In reply to comment #1)
> That's as designed. If you want them, download the zip.

Please document this design decision on the web page that describes the packages
that are being downloaded.
OK, clarified in the packaging README.  Change will be visible at next release.

description:
The windows EXE distribution is missing catalina.bat. This is required by
3rd-party tools, such as Netbeans.

I'm expecting the ZIP and EXE distributions to unpack the exact same files. I'm
not even given a choice in the GUI installer to install this component.
